alert.note: Alert for Iberia; Lower St. Martin; St. Mary; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 22 at 3:04AM CST until January 22 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 24 expected. For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27. * WHERE...Vermilion, Iberia, St. Mary and Lower St. Martin Parishes. * WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Warning, from 10 PM this evening to 8 AM CST Sunday. For the Freeze Warning, until 9 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Iberia; Lower St. Martin; St. Mary; Vermilion
